~y~(C)Warning:(/C) ~s~\"reload-switching\" is ~r~not allowed ~s~on this server; abusing this glitch will force your character to reload without moving.
~y~(C)Attenzione:(/C) ~s~\"Reload-Switching\" ~r~non è permesso ~s~in questo server; abusare di questo glitch costringerà il tuo personaggio a ricaricare senza muoversi.
~y~(C)Let op:(/C) ~s~\"reload-switching\" is ~r~niet toegestaan ~s~op deze server; het misbruiken van deze glitch forceert je character om te herladen zonder te bewegen.
~y~(C)Uyarı:(/C) ~s~\"tekrar yükle-değiştirme\" dir ~r~izin verilmedi ~s~Bu aksaklığı kötüye kullanmak, karakterinizi hareket etmeden tekrar yüklemeye zorlar.
~y~(C)Achtung:(/C) ~s~\"Reload-Switching\" ist auf diesem Server ~r~nicht erlaubt.~s~ Das Ausnutzen dieses Glitches führt dazu, dass du nachlädst, ohne, dass sich den Charakter bewegt.
~y~(C)Advertencia:(/C) ~s~\"Reload-Switching\" ~r~no está permitido ~s~en este servidor; abusar de este bug obligará a tu personaje a recargar sin que pueda moverse.
~y~(C)Avertissement:(/C) ~s~\"Recharger en changeant d'arme" n'est ~r~pas autorisé ~s~sur notre serveur; utiliser ce glitch va obliger ton personnage à recharger sans pouvoir bouger.
~y~(C)Uwaga:(/C) ~s~\"reload-switching\" ~r~jest niedozwolony ~s~na tym serwerze; wykorzystywanie tego błędu spowoduje ładowanie broni przez twoją postać w bezruchu.
~y~(C)تحذير:(/C) ~s~\"reload-switching\" ~r~غير مسموح ~s~على هذا السيرفر; إساءة استخدام هذا الخطأ سيؤدي إلى إجبار شخصيتك علي إعادة التحميل السلاح دون تحرك.
~y~(C)警告：(/C) ~s~\"換彈輔助\" 是 ~r~不允許 ~s~使用的；濫用這個Bug將迫使你的角色在不移動的情況下重新加載.
~y~(C)警告：(/C) ~s~\"换弹辅助\" 是 ~r~不允许 ~s~使用的；滥用这个Bug将迫使你的角色在不移动的情况下重新加载.
~y~(C)Warning:(/C) ~s~\"Reload-Switching\" não é ~r~é permitido ~s~é esse servidor; O abuso desse bug forçará seu personagem a recarregar sem poder se mover..
~y~~h~Warning~h~~s~: You had lost {0} weapons, possibly done by a cheater, but (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~restored ~s~them for you.
~y~~h~Attenzione~h~~s~: Avevi perso {0} armi, probabilmente un azione svolta da un cheater, ma (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) le ha ~g~ripristinate ~s~per te.
~y~~h~Let op~h~~s~: Je had {0} wapens verloren, mogelijk door een hacker, maar (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) heeft ze voor je ~g~hersteld~s~.
~y~~h~Uyarı~h~~s~: Kaybetmiştin {0} silahları, muhtemelen bir dolandırıcı tarafından yapılmıştır, ancak (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~restore edildi ~s~senin için.
~y~~h~Achtung~h~~s~: Du hast {0} Waffen verloren, möglicherweise durch einen Cheater, aber das (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) hat sie für dich ~g~wiederhergestellt~s~.
~y~~h~Advertencia~h~~s~: Habías perdido {0} armas, posiblemente por culpa de un hacker, pero (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~te las devolvio~s~.
~y~~h~Avertissement~h~~s~: Tu as perdu {0} armes, possiblement à cause d'un cheater, mais notre (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~a restauré ~s~tes armes perdues.
~y~~h~Uwaga~h~~s~: Utraciłeś {0} broni, prawdopodobnie usunął je oszust, ale (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~przywróciła ~s~je dla ciebie.
~y~~h~تحذير~h~~s~: لقد خسرت {0} أسلحة, ربما قام بغشاش أضافتهم الي حسابك ، و لكن (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~رجعها ~s~لك.
~y~~h~警告~h~~s~：你丟失了{0} 個武器，可能是作弊者所為，但是(C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~為你恢復了~s~ 它們.
~y~~h~警告~h~~s~：你丢失了{0} 个武器，可能是作弊者所为，但是(C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~为你恢复了~s~ 它们.
~y~~h~Advertência~h~~s~: Você havia perdido {0} armas, possivelmente por culpa de um hacker, mas (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~g~ele os devolveu a você~s~.
~y~~h~Warning~h~~s~: You had {0} unauthorized weapons, possibly spawned by a cheater to get you in trouble, but (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~r~removed ~s~them for you.
~y~~h~Attenzione~h~~s~: Avevi {0} armi illecite, probabilmente generate da un cheater per metterti nei guai, ma (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) le ha ~g~rimosse ~s~per te.
~y~~h~Let op~h~~s~: Je had {0} ongeautoriseerde wapens, mogelijk ingespawnt door een hacker om je in problemen te krigen, maar (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) heeft ze voor je ~r~weggehaald~s~.
~y~~h~Uyarı~h~~s~: Sende vardı {0} yetkisiz silahlar, muhtemelen başınızı belaya sokmak için bir dolandırıcı tarafından yaratılmıştır, ancak (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~r~kaldırıldı ~s~senin için.
~y~~h~Achtung~h~~s~: Du hast {0} unerlaubte Waffe, möglicherweise durch einen Cheater, um dich in Schwierigkeiten zu bringen, aber das (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) hat sie für dich ~r~entfernt~s~.

~y~~h~Advertencia~h~~s~: Usted tenia {0} armas que no estan permitidas en el servidor, posiblemente un hacker te las a puesto para meterte en problemas, pero (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~r~las a retirado ~s~de tu inventario.
~y~~h~Avertissement~h~~s~: Tu avais {0} armes interdites, possiblement à cause d'un cheater pour te causer du tord, mais notre (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) les a ~r~retirées ~s~pour toi.
~y~~h~Uwaga~h~~s~: Miałeś {0} nieautoryzowanych broni, prawdopodobnie dał ci je oszust, ale (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~r~usunęła ~s~je dla ciebie.
~y~~h~تحذير~h~~s~: كان معك {0} أسلحة غير مصرح بها, ربما قام بغشاش أضافتهم الي حسابك ليوقعك في مشكلة, و لكن (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~r~ازالهم ~s~من حسابك.
~y~~h~警告~h~~s~：你擁有{0} 個未經授權的武器，可能是外掛為了給你帶來麻煩而生成的，但是(C)GTA CnR Shield(/C ) ~r~已刪除 ~s~該武器.
~y~~h~警告~h~~s~：你拥有{0} 个未经授权的武器，可能是外挂为了给你带来麻烦而生成的，但是(C)GTA CnR Shield(/C ) ~r~已删除 ~s~该武器.

~y~~h~Advertência~h~~s~: Você tinha {0} armas que não são permitidas no servidor,possivelmente um hacker lhe deu uma maneira de se meter em problemas., mas (C)GTA CnR Shield(/C) ~r~os removeu ~s~de seu inventário.
